name: dbstudios/php-api-common
description: Contains common code for building PHP REST APIs

suggest.symfony/validator: If you want to use the ValidationFailedError API error class
suggest.dbstudios/doctrine-query-document: If you want to use the Doctrine Query Document errors or the AbstractApiController
suggest.lexik/jwt-authentication-bundle: If you want to use the lexik/jwt-authentication-bundle support code
suggest.dbstudios/entity-transformers: If you want to use the AbstractApiController
suggest.dbstudios/doctrine-entities: If you want to use the AbstractApiController
suggest.doctrine/orm: If you want to use the AbstractApiController
suggest.symfony/event-dispatcher: If you want to use the event features of AbstractApiController
